entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or snow in the evening then to periods of snow overnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
